description: This Kotlin file implements the MainActivity class for an Android app, handling UI initialization, navigation among fragments, theme application, and bottom navigation animations.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity of the app managing navigation, theme, and fragment transactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes repositories, sets theme, sets up navigation, and loads the initial fragment.

methods.name: navigateHome
methods.description: Loads the Home fragment with transition effects.

methods.name: navigateFavorites
methods.description: Loads the Favorites fragment with transition effects.

methods.name: navigateCart
methods.description: Loads the Cart fragment with transition effects.

methods.name: navigateDelivery
methods.description: Loads the Delivery fragment with transition effects.

methods.name: applyThemeMode
methods.description: Applies theme mode based on user preferences.

methods.name: applyMaterialMotion
methods.description: Applies material motion transitions to fragments depending on context.

methods.name: animateBottomNavSelection
methods.description: Animates the bottom navigation item selection, scaling and fading icons and labels.

methods.name: openMenu
methods.description: Loads the Menu fragment for a given restaurant ID, with transition effects.

methods.name: openCartTab
methods.description: Switches to the cart tab programmatically.

methods.name: openDelivery
methods.description: Navigates to the delivery tracking screen/tab.
